title: Figure, "Partisan", 1930
markings: underside: Dmitrov mark stamped in orange; 1818 incised in clay; 8-2-1930 impressed on top side of base.
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Bearded man dressed in cap, jacket, boots, stands on triangular-shaped base; around his right shoulder a rifle hands on strap, across left shoulder a cartridge belt, binoculars attached to belt, holds rail splitter, a piece of rail by his foot.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Partisan", 1930.
1930. Bisque porcelain, enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-162.
